product_name: adidas Terrex Fast X GTX Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: Cover distance with ease in the adidas Terrex Fast X GTX hiking shoes, which boast a lithe, supportive platform with stout waterproof protection to ensure comfort as you churn through miles. Airy nylon mesh uppers feature synthetic leather overlays for support; easy quick-pull lacing delivers a snug fit with minimal fuss. Gore-Tex(R) liners make these boots waterproof yet breathable, for comfort in a variety of conditions. Quick-drying nylon linings help wick moisture away from feet to enhance in-boot comfort. Antimicrobial finish on the OrthoLite(R) footbeds deters odors. EVA midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Thermoplastic urethane shanks deliver torsional stability and arch support; protection plates guard against stone bruising. The adidas Terrex Fast X GTX hiking shoes boast aggressive rubber outsoles for sure traction. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: Cover distance with ease in the adidas Terrex Fast X GTX hiking shoes, which boast a lithe, supportive platform with stout waterproof protection to ensure comfort as you churn through miles.
